data.name: textBox1.Text
data.value:
Thank you to the Lord our God for blessing me with the abilities to put this software together for you. Without the loving grace of God and his son Jesus Christ, this software would not be a reality.
I dedicate this software to my loving wife Sheila, and to our beautiful children Taryn and Joshua. Please visit http://www.dojonorthsoftware.net/AboutUs.html if you’d like to learn more about us. This software is also dedicated in loving memory to my grandfather Joseph "Joe" B. Sawyer, who was called home to the Lord on January 21, 2004.
A HUGE thanks goes out to colleagues at the Association of Software Professionals (http://www.asp-software.org) for their mentoring, guidance and coaching! In no particular order, from the ASP: Gert Rijs, Al Harberg, Andrew Gibson, Andrew Macdonald, Dennis Reinhardt, David Kocur, Owen Ransen and Gary Elfring. I encourage you to please check out the ASP and pay these folks’ websites a visit. These folks put together some great software, and they're great people too.
A special thanks to Mike Oliver (http://www.olivercorp.com) for his insights.
Kevin Kinnett, a fellow Christian, (http://kevinkinnett.com) developed and graciously provided the BoxCarDotNet module.
Adam ej Woods (http://www.aejw.com) for the Drive Mapping class.
Many visual elements such as icons are part of Microsoft Windows and are copyright © 1985-2012 Microsoft Corp.
Some of the icons used in this software are used under the Creative Commons Attribution-No Derivative Works 3.0 Unported License. The license terms can be found by visiting http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nd/3.0/. The icons listed below are used under the Creative Commons license:
The "Burn, Disc, Fire" icon was created by Visual Pharm (http://www.visualpharm.com). The icon was retrieved from Icon Gallery at http://icongal.com/gallery/icon/29822/128/burn_disk_fire.
The "Payment, Coins, Business, Money" icon was created by Visual Pharm (http://www.visualpharm.com). The icon was retrieved from Icon Gallery at http://icongal.com/gallery/icon/27866/128/payment_coins_business_money.
Use of icons from Icon Gallery in a commercial application requires attribution as attributed above.
Another big thanks goes out to the following folks for helping in beta testing. Without your help, this product would not be a reality!
Alex Kuretz, Alexander Kent, LLD, Phil Wood, Jerry Wade, Al West, Don Brickman, Ross Lambert, Doug Pencille, Gary Hillman, Boro Marinkovich, Jim Clark, Erik Weichelt and Mike "the Doc."
